Blog.post: hey people YAY sara'z baq !! omg hun i missed you soooo much > =) <>dre + margret at the theater " whoa " and cant wait for ur comin home party "even thought itz 2 daiz after u got baq" oh well it'll still b fun !! Anywaiz everyone.. itz late - im tired - g.nite !! TTYL lubz ♥ stay classy e.dot fallie ♥ [NOTICE : site has been edited - new pic page + new bg, check it out "link below"]

hey everyone IM BAQ !! i wuz at dre'z cottage for like a week , as most of you kno. So, first off i wud like to sai HAPPY B-DAI to sara + uncle fittz. itz hard to type, cuz i only have one arm , cuz i busted the other one at dre'z cottage > :( <>sick , but i had fun overall. anywaiz i need to go unpack and unwind and chat to keitan (who i unfortunitly didnt get to see todai and miss terriblly ) TTYL lubz ♥ stay classy e.dot ... f a l l i e ♥

hey everyone im currently sittin on keitanz lap at his house. he wantz me to put a capital on his name but i refuse to, so he's pouting and teasing me by kissing my neck , lmao not like u wanted or needed to kno any of that. anywaiz, i leavin tmw mornin for dre'z cottage and i still havnt packed lmao thatz me, waitin till the last minute . anywaiz i need to go have a " makeout session " wit keitan , so ill see ya later ;) lubz f a l l i e

hey everyone im so bored.. waitin for keitan to get here. im not lookin forward to all the laundry i ned to get done TODAI in order to go to dre'z cottage *gonna b a blazt* sighz, summers almost gone, but im actually lookin forward to 2nd semester, cuz i have co-op (teachin a gr2 class) > : P ashlee simpson yesterdai !! i only got one pic, cuz the security guards were assholez , but oh well, it wuz still worth it (even though we had to wait 8 hrz .. grrr) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - u make me wanna u make me wanna screeaam .. you make me wanna LALA in the kitchen on the floor ill be a french maid, when i meet you at the door im like an alley kat, drink the milk up i want more.. you make me wanna you make me wanna LALA - ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- lolz i cant get that part out of my head !! i love that song . anywaiz im gonna go get started on my laundry and work on my new scrapbook while i wait for keitan . Lubz ♥ TTYL stay classy e.dot ;) f a l l i e ♥

hey everyone im in missisauga wit keitan nadia + sara ... waitin to go swimmin , blahz. i cant wait for fridai wen we go to sara'z cottage !! lmao sara'z gonna kill me for packin wai too much shit but meh. anywaiz we're bout to get kicked off the comp so i have tp make this fast . ill check in later. lubz ♥ TTYL stay classy e.dot ;) fallie ♥

hey everyone well, i jus got baq from keitanz house , pretty late i kno, im not rele tired so im jus chillaxin, cant wait to go to dre'z + sara'z cottage soon !! gonna b fun timez. lmao i reak of chlorine cuz we were swimmin all dai , so nice. im hungry so im gonna go eat sumin soon, but not like u needed to kno that. i cant wait to start work at blockbuster [soon] wit dre , itz gonna b awsome " bye bye mCd'z ". Eric leave tmw for thunderbay .. im gonna miss ya !! i remember wen we, well i, were kidz .. lmao i used to torture u soo much, but now ur leavin > =( <>university . anywaiz im gonna go plai video games [my new obsession] till i pass out tired . TTYL lubz ♥ stay classy e.dot ... fallie ♥
